sect.title: Abstract
sect.para: This example illustrates how XslBricks work. XslBricks is an XSL template library that allows user to build a simple Syntext Serna XSL stylesheet for an arbitrary document in a few minutes. Moreover, the same XslBricks stylesheet will also produce similarly looking HTML!
The examples of XslBricks templates are following.

sect.title: Text Formatting
sect.para: This is a regular para. It may contain bold-emphasized words, italic-emphasized words, or even italic and bold together.
